content: make your own voluptuous no 4 an octopus with powerful undulating legs using worsted weight yarn and a g hook the finished product will be about 3 tall with legs that can engulf prey up to 9 in diameter the pattern assumes you know or are willing to google some basic american notation crochet stitches - single double slip increase decrease etc it does not however assume you like to decipher tricky code so it s written out in long form and i explain why certain stitches are called for at different times if you ve got basic crochet skills this project can be made in a leisurely evening however it s more complicated than others in the wunderkammer
